text: Ra karmapatra majhama rakhinecha, taba timile tyasabata papiharula'i bhayabhita bha'eko dekhnechau ra tiniharule bhannechan kasto aphasoca yo kasto kitaba ho ki na sano kurola'i chodecha na thulola'i, ra jo karma gareka hunchan sabaila'i tyasama pa'unechan, ra timro palanakartale kasaimathi an'yaya va atyacara garnechaina
